mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (customer_id, order_date, status, total_amount, order_at, expires_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{orderDate}, #{status}, #{totalAmount}, #{orderAt}, #{expiresAt}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_id, order_date, status, total_amount, order_at, expires_at, created_at, updated_at FROM `order` ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT id, customer_id, order_date, status, total_amount, order_at, expires_at, created_at, updated_at FROM `order` WHERE id = #{id} FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET customer_id = #{customerId}, order_date = #{orderDate}, status = #{status}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, order_at = #{orderAt}, expires_at = #{expiresAt}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `order` SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{orderId}
UPDATE `order` SET total_amount = #{totalAmount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_id, order_date, status, total_amount, order_at, expires_at, created_at, updated_at FROM `order` WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, customer_id, order_date, status, total_amount, order_at, expires_at, created_at, updated_at FROM `order` WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, customer_id, order_date, status, total_amount, order_at, expires_at, created_at, updated_at FROM `order` WHERE expires_at < NOW() AND status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY expires_at ASC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT id, customer_id, order_date, status, total_amount, order_at, expires_at, created_at, updated_at FROM `order` WHERE status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_amount), 0) FROM `order` WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' AND order_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
